x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Issue involving maps not loading correctly if there are no zones.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Missing Zones
x_nuvo_diag_probes.script:
var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
util.handleOutput('If maps are not loading in any application, and the instance does not use zones, then check with Nuvolo for the Zones_fix update set on SFM-9239', 'Warning','Space');

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_fcb22a151ba49510ae5b21b5ec4bcbc7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Issue involving maps not loading correctly if there are no zones. </description><healthcheck_type/><name>Missing Zones</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Update set from Nuvolo SFM-9239</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
